HediffDef.label: Uncertain Future
HediffDef.description: Used to control mage promotions.

HediffDef.label: Soothing Aura
HediffDef.description: An aura that generates and bestows a soothing presence on nearby pawns.

HediffDef.label: Soothing Breeze
HediffDef.description: A soothing presence that calms the spirit.

HediffDef.label: Soothing Breeze
HediffDef.description: A soothing presence that calms the spirit.

HediffDef.label: Soothing Breeze
HediffDef.description: A soothing presence that calms the spirit.

HediffDef.label: Soothing Breeze
HediffDef.description: A soothing presence that calms the spirit.

li.label: soothing breeze
li.description: Something is having a calming affect on me, I'm thinking clearly and I'm wasting less energy fretting about senseless concerns.

li.label: soothing breeze
li.description: Something is having a calming affect on me, I'm thinking clearly and I'm wasting less energy fretting about senseless concerns.

li.label: soothing breeze
li.description: With the wind at my back, I feel calm, relaxed, and focused and have the energy to keep going.

li.label: soothing breeze
li.description: All distractions have been washed away, I am utterly focused and have the confidence to execute all tasks to perfection.

HediffDef.label: Aura of Warmth
HediffDef.description: An aura that generates and bestows warmth and confidence.

HediffDef.label: Inner Fire
HediffDef.description: Fortifies the spirit, giving the pawn increased endurance and resistances.

HediffDef.label: Inner Fire
HediffDef.description: Fortifies the spirit, giving the pawn increased endurance and resistances.

HediffDef.label: Inner Fire
HediffDef.description: Fortifies the spirit, giving the pawn increased endurance and resistances.

HediffDef.label: Inner Fire
HediffDef.description: Fortifies the spirit, giving the pawn increased endurance and resistances.

HediffDef.label: Aura of Hope
HediffDef.description: An aura that generates and bestows an uplifting presence.

HediffDef.label: Ray of Hope
HediffDef.description: An uplifting presence that enlivens the spirit.

HediffDef.label: Ray of Hope
HediffDef.description: An uplifting presence that enlivens the spirit.

HediffDef.label: Ray of Hope
HediffDef.description: An uplifting presence that enlivens the spirit.

HediffDef.label: Ray of Hope
HediffDef.description: An uplifting presence that enlivens the spirit.

li.label: Glimmer of hope
li.description: I have this glimmer of hope that wasn't there before!

li.label: Ray of hope
li.description: Theres a ray of light breaking through this dark mood, I finally feel like we have a chance.

li.label: Beacon of hope
li.description: All the misfortune that's befallen us is being burned away by a brilliant light, I have a burst of energy and feel amazing!

HediffDef.label: AMP
HediffDef.description: A burst of energy that amplifies physical attributes.

HediffDef.label: AMP
HediffDef.description: A burst of energy that amplifies physical attributes.

HediffDef.label: AMP
HediffDef.description: A burst of energy that amplifies physical attributes.

li.label: pumped
li.description: I feel great. This is better than Go-Juice.

li.label: amped
li.description: This is amazing! I could run like the wind and fight like a lion - nothing can stop me!

li.label: surging energy
li.description: I'm surging with power, I feel unstoppable.

HediffDef.label: Shadow Aura
HediffDef.description: An aura that generates and bestows a shadowy presence.

HediffDef.label: Arcane Shadow
HediffDef.description: A shadowy presence that precipitates action.

HediffDef.label: Arcane Shadow
HediffDef.description: A shadowy presence that precipitates action.

HediffDef.label: Arcane Shadow
HediffDef.description: A shadowy presence that precipitates action.

HediffDef.label: Arcane Shadow
HediffDef.description: A shadowy presence that precipitates action.

li.label: anxious
li.description: There's a tingling sensation at the back of my neck, like I'm always being watched... it's creepy.

li.label: nervous
li.description: I keep seeing something out of the corner of my eye, it feels like someone is right behind me and it has me on edge.

li.label: distraught
li.description: There's another presence next to me, assisting in everything I do. It knows what to do before I do. Am I possessed?!

HediffDef.label: Bestow Might
HediffDef.description: A mighty combat boon.

HediffDef.label: Bestow Might
HediffDef.description: A mighty combat boon.

HediffDef.label: Bestow Might
HediffDef.description: A mighty combat boon.

HediffDef.label: Bestow Might
HediffDef.description: A mighty combat boon.

HediffDef.label: Ranger Bond
HediffDef.description: Represents the bond this animal shares with a Ranger. Increases physical attributes and enhances healing.

HediffDef.label: Shield
HediffDef.description: Absorbs damage.

HediffDef.label: Shield
HediffDef.description: Absorbs damage.

HediffDef.label: Sprint (I)
HediffDef.description: Increases movement.

HediffDef.label: Sprint (II)
HediffDef.description: Increases movement.

HediffDef.label: Sprint (III)
HediffDef.description: Increases movement.

HediffDef.label: Invulnerable
HediffDef.description: Prevents damage while active.

HediffDef.label: Invulnerable
HediffDef.description: Prevents damage while active.

HediffDef.label: Fortitude
HediffDef.description: Mitigates all damage by a set amount.

HediffDef.label: Mana Shield
HediffDef.description: Sacrifices magical energy to absorb damage.

HediffDef.label: Blinded
HediffDef.description: Reduces sight.

li.label: blinded
li.description: There was a flash of light and what it revealed to me... I can't... I don't want to see anymore!

HediffDef.label: Regeneration
HediffDef.description: Regenerates health and heals wounds over time. Each tick will restore health to an injury until the injury is healed.

HediffDef.label: Regeneration (I)
HediffDef.description: Regenerates health and heals wounds over time. Each tick will restore health to an injury until the injury is healed.

HediffDef.label: Regeneration (II)
HediffDef.description: Regenerates health and heals wounds over time. Each tick will restore health to an injury until the injury is healed.

HediffDef.label: Regeneration (III)
HediffDef.description: Regenerates health and heals wounds over time. Each tick will restore health to an injury until the injury is healed.

HediffDef.label: Bladedancer
HediffDef.description: Bladedancer stat boon.

HediffDef.label: Bow Mastery
HediffDef.description: Ranger stat and bow enhancement boon.

HediffDef.label: Spell Mending
HediffDef.description: Rapidly repairs equipped apparel and weapons.

HediffDef.label: Resurrection weakness
HediffDef.description: Result of being resurrected through magic.

HediffDef.label: Returned from Death
HediffDef.description: The backlash resulting from reversing death.

HediffDef.label: Disease Immunity
HediffDef.description: Increases natural disease immunity rates.

HediffDef.label: Disease Immunity
HediffDef.description: Increases natural disease immunity rates.

HediffDef.label: Blur
HediffDef.description: Manipulates possibility to avoid damage.

HediffDef.label: Invisibility
HediffDef.description: Causes the affected pawn to become invisible and untargetable by nearby enemies.

HediffDef.label: Magelight
HediffDef.description: A small light sustained by magic.

HediffDef.label: Slow
HediffDef.description: Slowed limbs affected by frost.

HediffDef.label: Heat Protection
HediffDef.description: A small boon that cools and increases resistance to high temperatures.

HediffDef.label: Refreshed
HediffDef.description: Refreshes a pawn, reducing weariness.

HediffDef.label: Cold Protection
HediffDef.description: A small boon that heats and increases resilience to cold temperatures

HediffDef.label: Shock Therapy
HediffDef.description: Trains the mind to improve behavior.

HediffDef.label: Jolt
HediffDef.description: A small boon that increases physical energy.

HediffDef.label: Energy Regeneration
HediffDef.description: Increases energy regeneration rates as a multiple of the buff's severity.

HediffDef.label: SS Serum
HediffDef.description: A chemical enhancing physical abilities and magical resistance; reduces magical power and energy regeneration. The potency of the chemical increases in 3 stages and takes 100 days to fully mature. Pawns will recover consciousness 2 days after taking the serum.

HediffDef.label: Shadow Slayer Cloak
HediffDef.description: Shadow slayer cloaking field is active - performing actions that the predictive engine is unable to track will rapidly erode the cloaking field.

HediffDef.label: Haste
HediffDef.description: Attack rate is doubled.

HediffDef.label: Heat shield
HediffDef.description: Increases heat resistance and cannot catch fire.
